items.summary: Redesign the `/page-3` page to replace the current placeholder card with a fully designed, production-ready page layout that matches the visual quality and structure of Page 2 (hero, content sections, and CTA).
Update Page 3 SEO metadata to use a meaningful English title and description aligned with PB Partners Hub and the new Page 3 content, keeping the canonical URL as `/page-3`.
Add clear navigation CTAs on Page 3 that route to existing flows (at minimum `/partner-onboarding` and `/contact`) using the existing button/link patterns used on Page 2.
Apply a coherent visual theme for Page 3 that fits the existing site styling (use existing design tokens and patterns) and keep spacing/typography consistent across sections.
